title: Eppalock: the first six months
creator_contributor_role: Soil Conservation Authority of Victoria, production company

description: The Soil Conservation Authority's first six months work on the big Eppalock catchment project, in which the Authority is cooperating with government departments, landholders and local councils to apply soil conservation measures to the whole of an 800 square mile catchment to ensure that only pure silt free water reaches the Eppalock Reservoir.
